about.title: About Me
about.name: Andie Orozco
about.greeting: Hi, I'm Andie Orozco! Founder of Andie Orozco's Nails.
about.paragraph1: My journey started in 2021, when I couldn't find a salon that took the time to create the detailed, creative nail designs I dreamed of. Tired of rushed appointments and limited options, I started doing my own nails to express my personal style.
about.paragraph2: Soon, friends and followers began noticing my work ‚Äî and asking me to do theirs too. What began as a personal passion has now grown into a business rooted in creativity and quality service.
about.paragraph3: My goal is giving every client a personalized experience that leaves them feeling seen, confident, and proud of their look! Whether it's a minimalist set or a bold, artistic design ‚Äî your nails deserve time, care, and creativity. I'm here to deliver just that!
